version_description: Bug fixes & improvements

- Group features: create new group, reply to message, mention group members using @, seen status, etc
- Improve search features

Add suggestions for GIF, MP3 searching using @. 
Have a great time with Zalo updated features.

- More @GIF, @MP3 improvements
- Improve performance and stability

- Search for messages in conversations
- Find friends via phone number right from Global search 
- Add Shared Media in group conversations where your photos, files and documents are kept
- Group management tools for group admins and ability to change group avatar 

Thanks for joining Zalo on our incredible journey!

- Search for messages in conversations

Thanks for joining Zalo on our incredible journey!

- Major improvements to timeline bring faster speed and better experience 
- Search for messages and phone numbers right from Global Search

Secret message: Now available for iOS and Android users using latest Zalo versions. 
Get started by swiping up the conversation screen from the bottom.

- Add video call feature
- Camera flow improvement

- Add story feature where you can share your 24-hour moments
- Camera improvements with faster photo capture and easier editing
- Prepare for Noel and New Year

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!

- Minor bug fixes

Happy new year 2017!

- Update new theme chat

New features for GROUP conversations:
- Add your reaction to any photos, videos, files, and links 
- Set a group notice to easily plan your activities
- Share media: Automatically store photos, documents and links on the cloud that you can have access to wherever you log in.

Create your own family or close friends GROUP to share memories and discuss your everyday stories!

- Use @Guggy in conversations to create customized stickers like haha, hihi, huhu, etc
- Set notice in group conversations' Options menu to start plans and remind others

Enhance sound quality in call.
Support video call with high quality.
Support dark mode.
Remember and be notified about upcoming group reminders and anniversaries.

- Support dark mode.
- Enjoy video chat with relatives with sharpened picture enhancement.
- Increase the call experience by stabilizing the connection and improving performance on iOS 13.
- View similar photos: Easily filter and view similar photos by date or by sender.
- Expand group admins settings: Pinning messages, approving members... as the Group owner.
- View mutual groups: View all the mutual groups between you and the other contact.

- Support dark mode.
- Enjoy video chat with relatives with sharpened picture enhancement.

- View similar photos: Easily filter and view similar photos by date or by sender.
- Expand group admins settings: Pinning messages, approving members... as the Group owner.
- View mutual groups: View all the mutual groups between you and the other contact.

- Personal Reminder: Easily set a personal reminder with just a few clicks.
- Trending stickers: Freely express yourself with Zalo's hot new stickers.
New feature Profile Music: make your profile standout.

Zalo update: Better information management with Pin list
- Pin more messages for your conversation
- Order pins freely
- Quickly view upcoming reminder

Zalo new update: Group video call - Closing the distance
Group video call provides a seamless conversation with HD sound and high quality images. 
With this feature, Zalo aims to upgrade the experience for family groups, small working or learning teams or groups of close friends...

Support iPad interface.

Support iPad interface.
Performance improvement.

In this new version, Zalo presents new features and improvements: 
- Messaging permission for groups: Group owners and admins can go to "Group settings", select "Right to send messages" and edit which members can send message.
- Another improvement targets the audio call experience. This update allows quick switching to video call without having to end the current audio call.

In this new version, Zalo presents new features and improvements: 
- Messaging permission for groups: Group owners and admins can go to "Group settings", select "Right to send messages" and edit which members can send message.
- Another improvement targets the audio call experience. This update allows quick switching to video call without having to end the current audio call.

"People come and go. Seasons may change. But memories always remain."

In this version, let's treasure your memories with On these days on Timeline
- On These Days shows you memories to look back on from that particular period in your Timeline history. Memories include things like your posts, photos...
- Two ways to see your memories: Visit Timeline, choose "Memories" tag; Or tap on your "On This Day" on Timeline.

Zalo continues to improve the in-call experience with Low data mode. Zalo users can limit data usage and make seamless video call even with weak signal.

In this version, Zalo helps you to select and add photos available on your phone's photo library to Group collections.
In a Group collection, select Add items. Switch to Device tab and select the photos you want to add.
Zalo introduces a new version with improvements and upgrades as our next step to continuously enhance user experience.

Zalo upgrades the group video call experience to help you stay in touch with your family and loved ones
Family forever, never apart. Maybe in distance, never in heart. Stay close to your family with group video calls

In this version, you can scan QR code at health declaration locations. After filling your health declaration form, all information will be autosaved into QR folder on your Messages tab.

You can easily access and submit your details without having fill the form again.

In this new update, Zalo brings you the ability to change ringtones. Choose between the default Zalo ringtone and the current system ringtone.

Go to Settings, select Call, select Ringtone, and pick a favorite ringtone.

In this new version, Zalo presents 2 new tabs: Me and Discovery.
- Me tab is the hub for your account's information, security, and privacy settings.
- Discovery tab helps you explore convenient features and utilities like calendar, weather, etc.

Pin messages is now available for 2-person conversations. Helping you keep track and find important messages more easily when chatting with friends. 
To pin a message, long press on it and press Pin.
